<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 70

**Trapdoor Lunge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature comes within 25 feet of the spider's lair while the spider is positioned just under the ajar trapdoor and the spider notices the creature; **Requirements** Initiative has not yet been rolled; **Effect** The spider Strides or [Climbs](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) before it rolls initiative.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus ogre spider venom

**Eerie Flexibility**   A trapdoor ogre spider can fit through tight spaces as if it were a Large creature. While [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), it can move at full speed.

**Ogre Spider Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 22; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 1, and flat-footed (1 round); **Stage 4** 2d6 poison and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 round).

</column>
